name: borneo
description:
This version of pl_borneo has hundreds of small changes which significantly improve competitive suitability.
The original map pl_borneo was made by Sean "Heyo" Cutino and Matt "vhalin" Leahy

changes.message: Optimization
The clipping around the beams in garage
The lip above the controlpoint-barn by making it non-solid
Chickenwire beneath the staircase next to corn
Chickenwire to the picket-fences surrounding the map
Chickenwire to the track side of the barn
Chickenwire underneath the shed outside of blue spawn
Clipping the bridge before garage outside third
Clipping to the windows on last
Glass to all the servers props so they act like a flat wall on last
Collision all railing and replace the collision mesh with clip brushes
Collision on all pipes
Lamp solidity; some in last still collide with players
Solidity from the lights and added clipping to the underside of the catwalks
The holes in the wooden fences along the bridge and cliff
Clipped between the nodes along the fence on the left side on last
Clipped the tunnel leading to third
Closed off the box stack on the bottom floor
Closed off under red spawn on last
Closed off under the bridge on last
Closed off under the platform on the left route on last
Closed the gaps beneath stairs and blockbulleted them
